Hugo Arredondo
Principal Sales Consultant @ Tenfold
April 24, 2015, Ian was senior to Hugo but didn’t manage directly

While many people will praise Ian's unmatched salesmanship and tenaciousness to grow a business, I believe that his capability to help his teammates grow as sales professionals is what truly sets him apart from other sales executives.Unlike most sales executives that simply want commit numbers and opportunity statuses, Ian will make time to truly understand a sales opportunity and, if necessary, collaborate with you and anyone else involved to help refine the sales strategy, pitch and positioning to create a win-win scenario for both the prospect and the sales team.  During the process, he will share his creativity to show you the many ways you can craft a deal, he will show the patience of a true mentor when you challenge his ideas, he will help you understand and navigate the internal and external politics that are part of any deal or situation and he will challenge you to do the best you ever done to close the deal.If you get to work with Ian consider yourself a lucky individual because, without a doubt, you will learn something from him that you can reuse throughout your sales career, no matter how much experience you have in the sales arena.

summary: Proven successful enterprise software sales, general management (VP/GM), products and technical field operations experience, across worldwide markets. An outgoing and energetic sales & technology executive with a broad experience. Experienced executive team member able to build and lead teams in sales, marketing, operations, engineering and business development. Demonstrable hands-on business leader developing and driving company strategy, with “start-up” mentality, effective leadership qualities and proven market development skills. Proven delivery track record from early stage business/start-up to market leading enterprise organizations. Adept at creating innovative selling models to maximize revenue generation from current enterprise software and opensource/SaaS (subscription sales) environments, while closing multi-million dollar contracts. Mr. Matteson previously served as the Vice President and General Manager for MicroStrategy Cloud. In this capacity, he is responsible for the General Management of MicroStrategy Cloud, including Product Strategy, Operations, and Sales functions, in addition to working with customers and partners to drive the leading edge world class technology and business solutions. Enjoy all aspects of sales, service, operations and customer facing roles immensely. Believe execution and passion are the keys to success.
name: Ian Matteson
title: Marketing Cloud Executive at Salesforce
